_xResult.title: Little Love Affair Shawl
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made boho scarf with textured detailing
_xResult.longdesc:
Images pass by, reflections of your deeper thoughts in your mind. You don't possess much. In fact, much is out of our control in this world. But is that perhaps the biggest gift?

 

Feel freedom and simplicity in this hand-crafted accessory. Textured and elegant, this luxury scarf can be worn as a wrap or a jacket. Choose whichever color makes your heart sing!

 

Most of the Aiste line is mix-and-match so you can layer them and play with the colors and textures. Enjoy this high quality clothing for many years to come . For custom made requests, let Aiste know your desires using the button below.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
